author: Snazzy Labs

This video dives into the TRMNL, an open-source e-ink display perfect for smart homes and productivity enthusiasts. Whether you want a sleek family calendar, real-time analytics, or a custom dashboard, this device does it all. With Apple integration and a variety of community-driven plugins, it’s a versatile gadget that bridges simplicity and functionality. title: This Open-Source E-Ink Screen Is My Favorite New Gadget
